Instructions: 

- Set up the GitHub Desktop program on your computer.
- Link your GitHub account.  You can find the login option in the **File** menu.  The login option should look like:

```{r echo = FALSE, results='asis'}

# expandable_html_image("github_desktop_sign_in.PNG", 20)
```

- Take a screenshot after you have signed in.
